document.full_text: on a night when the miami's 'big three' shined as the heat crushed the philadelphia 76ers 94-73, it was one of the team's lesser lights that earned the playoff plaudits in monday's game two of the eastern conference first round.
document.title: fans chant "mvp!" for heat's unsung anthony
lines_and_colors: on a night when the miami's 'big three' shined as the heat crushed the philadelphia 76ers 94-73, it was one of the team's lesser lights that earned the playoff plaudits in monday's game two of the eastern conference first round.
